metadata.title: Tuesday, 4th December, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Tourism and Art when the wildlife camps in the following areas in Nsumbu National Park will be opened in order to curb illegal activities
Minister of Agriculture and Livestock what progress was made towards the development of the following infrastructure country-wide in 2011
Minister of Agriculture and Livestock which Non-Governmental Organisations have been involved in the distribution of heifers to the vulnerable people in rural communities country-wide.
